channel.title: Mtp-634 webclient error
channel.description: Hey guys, so im using rune mtp-634 client thats webclient ready. Anyways i jarred the client and its working perfectly on my desktop as a .jar file. The thing is when i put it on my website it loads and lets me login then select the world. After i select the world and i press play its crashes and redirects me to "http://0.0.0.0/error_game_crash.ws". I have a feeling this has to do with the params in the html. Could anyone please tell me how to fix this?

item.title: Mtp-634 webclient error
item.dc:creator: @Viva_La_Vida Viva La Vida
item.description:
@Viva_La_Vida wrote:

I think you go to the launch.java file in the client, and change the “http://0.0.0.0” to your webclients address.

Read full topic

item.title: Mtp-634 webclient error
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

Hey guys,
so im using rune mtp-634 client thats webclient ready. Anyways i jarred the client and its working perfectly on my desktop as a .jar file. The thing is when i put it on my website it loads and lets me login then select the world. After i select the world and i press play its crashes and redirects me to “http://0.0.0.0/error_game_crash.ws”. I have a feeling this has to do with the params in the html. Could anyone please tell me how to fix this?
